data.name: ActionPriceDescriptionHtml
data.value:
This price is only valid for
  • Persons using Citavi exclusively for their own use
  • Students

data.name: AddLicensesDescription
data.value: The total price is displayed with discounts applied (if any). If sales tax is applicable it will be shown on your invoice.

data.name: AddLicensesHomeDescription
data.value: The total price is displayed. If sales tax is applicable it will be shown on your invoice.

data.name: AddToCart
data.comment: Are we sticking with the shopping bag icons? If so, the translation needs to be changed.

data.name: CitaviForHighSchools
data.value: Citavi for education, government, and non-profit

data.name: CitaviForStudents
data.value: Citavi for personal and student use

data.name: DiscountedPricesDescriptionHtml
data.value:
These prices are only valid for
  • Institutions of higher education
  • Schools
  • Government agencies
  • Non-Governmental Organizations (NGOs)
  • Registered non-profit organizations

data.name: HighSchoolsAuthoritiesEtc
data.value: Universities, government agencies, non-profit organizations, etc.

data.name: Offers
data.comment: Not sure about this. Right now using "Offers" and "Products"

data.name: SpecialDiscountPrice
data.value: Special price for former site license users

data.name: SpecialDiscountPriceHtmlDescription
data.value: After you leave your university (or if the site license is not renewed), you can purchase your own personal, non-expiring license for Citavi for Windows at a 50% discount. This license is only for home or educational use, cannot be given to another person, and cannot be used in commercial, educational, or other organizations, for which you can purchase {0} or a {1}.

data.name: SpecialPriceDescriptionHtml
data.value:
This special price is only valid for
  • Persons using Citavi exclusively for their own use
  • Students

data.name: VoucherDescriptionHtml
data.value:
Gift certificates can only be given to
  • Persons using Citavi exclusively for their own use
  • Students

data.name: YouCanAddOtherProducts
data.value: You can still add other products.

data.name: RemovedFromCart
data.value: The selected product has been removed

data.name: PriceCalculationDisclaimer
data.value: The VAT amount depends on international trade agreements and is displayed on the invoice. In certain cases, there may be no VAT.

data.name: SpecialPriceForCampusLicense
data.value: Special price for site license users

data.name: SpecialPriceForCampusLicenseDescriptionHtml
data.value: After you leave your university (or if the site license is not renewed), you can purchase your own personal, non-expiring license for Citavi for Windows at a 50% discount. This discount can only be used once and is not valid for future purchases. The license can be used on all personal devices, but it cannot be shared with or given to another person. The license is meant exclusively for home or educational use and cannot be used at work. For use in a commercial or non-profit organization, a license for commercial use or for education, government, and non-profit organizations must be purchased instead.

data.name: BuyVoucherDescriptionHtml
data.value: Before purchasing a gift certificate, please make sure that the recipient is not already able to use Citavi for free through a site license.

data.name: AddProducts
data.comment: Where is this? ML: Shop -> Cart panel -> Close button description

data.name: CartQuantityIsOverLimit
data.value: Want more than {0} licenses? Please contact us: sales@citavi.com

data.name: LoginToMyShop
data.value:
Already have a Citavi license?
Log in or create an account to receive upgrade and volume discounts.

data.name: NoUpgradesAvailable
data.value: Your account does not contain any licenses that are eligible for an upgrade.

data.name: UpgradeHtml1
data.value:
Would you like to obtain an upgrade for licenses you purchased in the past?
You can do so in your Citavi account.

data.name: UpgradeHtml4
data.value: Don't have a Citavi Account yet?

data.name: UpgradeHtml5
data.value: Register here with the email address that you used for your last order.
data.comment: Registrieren Sie sich hier mit der E-Mail-Adresse, die Sie bei der letzten Bestellung verwendet haben.

data.name: CartIsEmpty
data.value: Your basket is empty. Click "Add to basket" to add licenses to the basket.

data.name: CitaviAccountPresentNo
data.value:
No account?
Continue without logging in.

data.name: CitaviAccountPresentYes
data.value:
Please log in

You may benefit from the following:

  • volume discounts due to previous orders
  • upgrade discounts
  • special offers

data.name: AcademicPricingLabel
data.value: Academic pricing for education, government, and non-profit

data.name: HomePricingLabel
data.value: Home pricing for personal and student use

data.name: PartialBillInfo
data.value:
The new licenses have been added to an existing subscription. In the future, you'll only receive one bill for the renewal of all items in the subscription.

The price for this order will be calculated based on the time remaining until the subscription renewal.

data.name: SelectSubscriptionText1
data.value:
Licenses and other products with the same renewal date are bundled together in a subscription.

Select the subscription you want to add products to or create a new subscription.

data.name: SelectSubscriptionText2
data.value:
The price for this order will be calculated based on the time remaining until the subscription renewal.

Upon renewal you'll pay the full price for the next year.

data.name: MaintenanceInfo
data.value:
The selected licenses are valid indefinitely for the version purchased but upgrades to a new version require an additional purchase.

With a maintenance subscription you will receive new upgrades as soon as they are released.

If you decide not purchase a maintenance subscription, you can still purchase upgrades individually with a 50% discount off the normal price.

data.name: CannotBuy
data.value: Subscriptions cannot be combined with product purchases in the same order. Please carry out one purchase at a time or remove the existing item from your basket.

data.name: CartHasCommercialProducts
data.value: You already have a product in your basket. Subscription-based products can only be ordered along with a new subscription. If you want to extend an existing subscription, please place a second order.

data.name: Cart_IntegrateSubscriptionDescription
data.value:
The subscription is valid until {0}.
The price will be reduced based on the date.

data.name: Cart_SubscriptionPayment
data.value: The payment method you used last time will be used again unless you change it. Sie können sie View or edit payment method.

data.name: Order_Text
data.value:
You will receive two emails from our e-commerce provider cleverbridge:
  • An email with your receipt
  • An email with subscription information


Your order is now available in your Citavi account.

data.name: SelectAllowedSubscription
data.value: You already have a product with the same validity period in your basket. In this order you can only add products with the same validity period. To add an additional subscription with a different validity period, place a second order.
